item.title: About
item.description: Before 2020, my extent of computer knowledge was how to install Steam and play games. In Nov. 2020, I completely switched to Linux, doing a step by step command line installation, having never actually used any Unix-like system before, making myself learn if I wanted to use my computer. Going down this path of learning all I could of computers and operating systems drastically increased my interest in the Cyber Security field.
